param.description: The higher the number, the less darker the environment will have to be for the camera to switch from color to B/W.

param.name: Switching from B/W to Color
param.description: This number should always be lower than the number set to color to B/W.

param.description: Affect the quality of the color in the image. The higher the numbers, the video will have brighter colors.
